text: The Slovakia national beach soccer team represents Slovakia in international beach soccer competitions and is controlled by the SFZ, the governing body for football in Slovakia. == Achievements == * FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup qualification (UEFA) Best: Group stage ** 2008, 2011, 2015 == External links == * Team's profile on Beach Soccer Worldwide * Team's profile on Beach Soccer Russia Category:National beach soccer teams Beach Soccer Category:European national beach soccer teams
title: Slovakia national beach soccer team
